name: NepaliDate
0:
”Alexa, open Nepali Date.”
”What is the Nepali date for today?”
”Alexa, open Nepali Date and convert July 19 2018 to Nepali.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nepali date
des: Use Nepali Date to convert a Gregorian date (AD) into Nepali date in Bikram Sambat (BS). Enable the Nepali Date skill and just ask 'what is the Nepali date today?' or 'what is the Nepali date for July 19, 2018?' to get the corresponding Nepali date.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
